    • Class com.mlt.desktop.control.table.TableCmp extends javax.swing.JTable implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • tableControl

          Table tableControl
          Parent table control.

        • listeners

          java.util.List<E> listeners
          List of table listeners.

        • marginToAdjustColumnWidth

          int marginToAdjustColumnWidth
          A standard margin (inset) to adjust column width.

        • rowsToAdjustColumnWidth

          int rowsToAdjustColumnWidth
          The number of rows to adjust column width.

        • fixedRowHeight

          boolean fixedRowHeight
          Fixed row height. By default fixed row height is set to true and a suitable row height is calculated every time the width of the columns is recalculated, scanning 'rowsToAdjustColumnWidth' rows.

          If fixed row height is set to false, a complete scan of all rows is required to set the height of each row. This is done again when adjusting columns widths, and the 'rowsToAdjustColumnWidth' is replaced by the total number of rows.

        • pageSize

          int pageSize
          Page size, re-calculated at every resize event.

        • tableSort

          TableSorter tableSort
          The table sort definition.

        • sortingEnabled

          boolean sortingEnabled
          A boolean that indicates if sorting clicking the header is enabled.

        • selectionMode

          SelectionMode selectionMode
          Selection mode.

        • selectedRanges

          java.util.List<E> selectedRanges
          List of selected/unselected ranges.

        • previousFocusCell

          Cell previousFocusCell
          Previous focus cell.

        • focusCell

          Cell focusCell
          Current focused cell.

        • horizontalDirection

          Direction horizontalDirection
          Horizontal movement of current cell.

        • verticalDirection

          Direction verticalDirection
          Vertical movement of current cell.

        • cfg

          TableCfg cfg
          Table configuration.
